resources.string: There is no music to play
When you open the app a list of musicians appears below. Clicking on a musician, will lead to a new activity with a list of albums.
In this activity, the musician\'s albums will be listed. When click, the album will call another activity with the list of musics.
In this activity are listed the album\'s musics. When a music have and MediaPlayer/Sound file, it has the option to play.
